name: Islam Duisenbek
description: I'm Frontend Developer.The FrontEnd developer creates a part of the web page that is visible to the user, and his main task is to accurately convey what the designer created in the layout, as well as to implement user logic.

name: Bekzhan Aronov
description: I'm Backend Developer.Backend developers build code that allows a database and an application to communicate with one another. Backend developers take care and maintain the back-end of a website, Including databases, servers, and apps, and they control what you don't see

name: Nurgazina Kamila
description: I'm Designer and Tech Writer.The main task of a technical writer is to write a document that would satisfy certain requirements. Requirements can be determined both by regulations that exist in the industry of application of the product, and by various goals for itself.
